auth.name: Full Name

eye_contact.1: Limited eye contact reducing connection with audience.
eye_contact.2: Eye contact could be more consistent and engaging.
eye_contact.3: Reasonable eye contact with room for improvement.
eye_contact.4: Strong eye contact that builds good rapport.
eye_contact.5: Outstanding eye contact creating powerful connections.

body_stability.1: Body instability is distracting and affects presence.
body_stability.2: Body stability needs improvement for better impact.
body_stability.3: Adequate body stability with minor adjustments needed.
body_stability.4: Good body stability that projects confidence.
body_stability.5: Perfect body stability demonstrating strong presence.

head_posture.1: Head posture appears unnatural and distracting.
head_posture.2: Head posture lacks consistency and needs attention.
head_posture.3: Decent head posture with room for improvement.
head_posture.5: Perfect head posture creating professional impression.

self_touching.3: Moderate self-touching behavior that could be reduced.
self_touching.5: Excellent self-control with no distracting behaviors.

facing_away.1: Frequently facing away disconnects from audience.
facing_away.2: Occasional facing away behavior needs improvement.
facing_away.3: Adequate audience facing with room for consistency.
facing_away.4: Mostly faces audience creating good connection.
facing_away.5: Perfect audience engagement and eye contact.
